### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=1.5, y=1.0)
Consists of steam engine, boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0) and offshore pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5) and position(x=-11.5, y=26.5)
### Copper plate mine at position(x=1.5, y=1.0)
No copper plate mine structures found
### Copper cable factory
No copper cable factory structures found
### Boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0) and position(x=1.5, y=3.0)
Consists of boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0) and position(x=1.5, y=3.0) connected to pipes
### Offshore pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5) and position(x=-11.5, y=26.5)
Consists of offshore pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5) and position(x=-11.5, y=26.5) connected to pipes
### Pipe network
Consists of multiple pipe groups with various positions and connections

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to each other to establish a connection
- Verify that the connection points of the entities are correctly aligned
### Errors when placing entities
- Make sure to move to the target position before attempting to place an entity
- Ensure that the target position is not occupied by another entity
- Check that the entity can be placed at the target position without any obstacles or restrictions
### Errors when using pipes
- Ensure that the pipes are correctly connected to the entities
- Verify that the pipe network is properly configured to allow fluid flow
### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure that the offshore pumps are correctly placed and connected to the pipe network
- Verify that the offshore pumps are not attempting to extract fluid from an empty source
### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure that the boilers are correctly connected to the pipe network and have a fuel source
- Verify that the boilers are not overheating or experiencing any other operational issues
### Errors due to nil values
- Ensure that all variables and entities are properly initialized before use
- Verify that there are no nil values being passed to functions or used in calculations
### Errors due to indexing issues
- Ensure that all indices and positions are correctly calculated and within valid ranges
- Verify that there are no indexing issues when accessing or manipulating entities or data structures
